column2: TC-1-P :: Perform a keyword search and sort results
Actions
column3: Expected Result

column2: Start on the Homepage: http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9980/
column3: The homepage is displayed with the search field and category dropdown visible.

column2: Enter "motorcycles" in the Keyword search field
column3: The keyword "motorcycles" is entered in the search field.

column2: Click on the "Search" button.
column3: The search results page is displayed, showing listings containing the keyword "motorcycles" in the title or description.

column2: Verify the total number of listings found is displayed.
column3: The total number of listings found is 114 on the results page

column2: Sort the search results by "Lower price first"
column3: The listings are reordered, with the lowest-priced items appearing at the top.

column2: Verify that each listing shows a title, thumbnail image, price, location, and date posted.
column3: All listings contain these details in the grid view.

column2: TC-2-P :: Combine keyword and category filters, then filter by price
Actions
column3: Expected Result

column2: Start on the Homepage: http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9980/
column3: The homepage is displayed with the search field and category dropdown visible.

column2: Enter "speaker" in the Keyword search field.
column3: The keyword "speaker" is entered in the search field.

column2: Select "Musical instruments" from the Category dropdown.
column3: The category "Musical instruments" is selected from the dropdown menu.

column2: Click on the "Search" button.
column3: The search results page is displayed, showing listings that match both the keyword "speaker" and the "Musical instruments" category.

column2: Enter $200 in the Minimum Price field and $500 in the Maximum Price field.
column3: The price range $200-$500 is entered in the price filter fields.

column2: Click on the "Apply" button to filter results by price.
column3: The search results are filtered to show only listings with prices between $200 and $500.

column2: Verify that the filtered listings match the selected keyword, category, and price range.
column3: Only listings with prices within the specified range and matching the keyword and category are displayed.

column2: TC-3-P :: Login, search by keyword & category, choose an add, and leave a comment
Actions
column3: Expected Result

column2: Start on the Homepage: http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9980/
column3: Home page OsClass loads with search bar, category dropdown, and "Login" option visible

column2: Click "Login" button
column3: Login page appears with email and password fields

column2: Enter email "blake.sullivan@gmail.com" and password "Password.123", check "Remember me", click "Log in"
column3: User is logged in, homepage reloads with "My account" and "Logout" options visible

column2: Enter "camera" in keyword field, select "Photo + video" category, click "Search"
column3: Search results page loads with camera listings

column2: Choose "Rochester (Pennsylvania)" from location dropdown, click "Apply"
column3: Search results update to show camera listings in Rochester, Pennsylvania

column2: Click on "Camera - Revere 8 mm" listing on the top of the list
column3: Detailed listing page opens showing item specifics, price ($20.00), and seller information

column2: Scroll to comment section, enter title "Nice camera" and comment "Nice product", click "Send"
column3: Comment submission successful, confirmation message appears

column2: Look for comment approval notification
column3: Green notification bar appears stating "Your comment has been approved"

column2: Scroll through listing page to check if your comment is visible
column3: A comment "Nice camera by Blake Sullivan" is visible

column2: Delete the comment "Nice camera by Blake Sullivant"
column3: Comment list is empty

column2: TC-5-P :: Create a new add - without image
Actions
column3: Expected Result

column2: Start on the Homepage: http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9980/
column3: Home page OsClass loads with search bar, category dropdown, and "Login" option visible

column2: Click "Login" button
column3: Login page appears with email and password fields

column2: Enter email "blake.sullivan@gmail.com" and password "Password.123", then click "Log in"
column3: User is logged in, homepage reloads with "My account" and "Logout" options visible

column2: Click "Publish Ad"
column3: The “Publish a listing” page appears.

column2: Select "Bikes" in the Caterory dropdown.
column3: Bikes category is selected.

column2: Enter "Motobecane all Carbon Fiber Shimano GRX equipped gravel bike" in the Title field
Enter "Selling my gorgeous Motobecane Carbon Fiber gravel bike equipped with 1 x 11 Shimano GRX gravel group." in the Description field
Set price at 1,495.00
column3: The price is visible at 1,495.00

column2: Select "California" in the Region dropdown
column3: California is selected as region

column2: Select "San Francisco" in the City dropdown
column3: San Francisco is selected as city

column2: Click on the "Submit" button
column3: Green notification bar appears stating "Your listing has been published" and the new add is visible with two buttons "Edit item" and "Delete"

column2: Click on the "Delete" button visible on the add
column3: A pop-up window appears

column2: Click on the "OK" button in the pop-up
column3: Green notification bar appears stating "Your listing has been published" and "My listings" page is displayed without the deleted add.

column3: Expected Result

column2: Sort by higher price first in the "Sort by:" drop-down menu

column3: Title of the item should be displayed in blue. Price with 2 decimals should be displayed by showing US dollars symbol. A short description should be displayed terminating with "…"

column2: Click on the title of the first element
column3:
The page should contain the title in the top. Price in currency USD dollars displayed
Fields published date should be populated (date less or equal to today) Location should be displayed following the template City­, State, United States 
Description is present
Contact seller button is displayed
Share button is displayed

column2: Click on the small icon image of the right
column3: The ad image is displayd full screen.

column2: click on the browser's back arrow to exit the image
column3: Item description page is available. Title is same as previous

column2: Click on contact seller
column3: Contact publisher is shown mail and name

column2: Click on share
column3: Formulary Send to a friend is displayed

column2: Logout

column2: TC-15-P :: Publish and delete an advertisement
Actions
column3: Expected Result

column2: Go to "http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9980/"
column3: The OsClass home page appears

column2: Click on "Publish Ad
column3: The "Publish a listing" page appears

column2: Click on "Publish" button
column3:
An error message appears with all the following fields:
- Title
- Description
- Region
- Email address
- Category

column2: Select the first proposal from the drop-down menu in the "Category" field
column3: The error message no longer mentions the category

column2: Enter the letter R in the "Title" field
column3: The error message regarding the title has changed, saying that a minimum of 5 characters is required for the title.

column2: Complete the content of the "Title" field with "oman statue".
column3: The "Title" field is identical to "Roman statue" and the error message no longer mentions the title.

column2: Enter the letter V in the "Description" field
column3: The error message regarding the description has changed, saying that at least 10 characters are required for the description.

column2: Write "Very beautiful statue" in the "Description" field
column3: The error message no longer mentions the description

column2: Select the second proposal from the drop-down menu in the "Region" field
column3: Error message no longer mentions location

column2: Write "blake.sullivan@gmail.com" for the email address
column3: Error message disappears

column2: Publish
column3: An error message asks you to choose a city

column2: Select the 3rd city from the drop-down menu and publish.
column3: A message appears stating that the user is already known

column2: Enter "blake.sullivan@gmail.com" in the E-mail field and "Password.123" as the password, then attempt to connect.
column3: The "Publish a listing" page reappears, already completed with the information entered previously, except for the email address.

column2: Publish
column3: The ad appears in the listing

column2: Delete ad
column3: A warning popup appears

column2: Confirm deletion
column3: Ad disappears from listing
